data.message: Was an amazing night and so cool to see the vast range of fans, saw a 10yo girl with her daddy kitted head to toe in rapture merch, and the sweetest little old couple probably about 70yrs young holding hands with their others in the air to you and everyone in-between!! Truely a legend that has lasted the test of time! I'm still buzzing. Hope to see your show back in NZ, I'm definitely keen for an encore :)
